divs: sighting detailsexcept for today all other previous time there are two lights in perpendicular \ position one lower toward the left side and the higher up toward the right side. these from a distance facing east or south east depending on what side of the us\mexico border you are. they are like two dots on a horizontal or when the light is coming at dawn you can see two very small dots of light. i usually wait until the first day of light is in because of the daylight you can hardly see them. today there was only one light but because it was a later time than the one on yesterday, tuesday 02\27\08. as a concluding point these lights seem to be on a stationary basis since from the last three months when i decided to look into the sky and on my way to the border i happen to see them; and they are very distinctly specially at that hour you just can't miss it. that it if you pay attention to them which is not very difficult to do. i even questioned a newspaper vendor a young girl and she did agreed to me that she has seen them. needles to say i have always been very much interested in everything related to ufo's since i was an adolescent. the image seem to be like an stationary base because it does not shine like a star. it's like a station like glow. i tried to take a photo with my digital camera but it did show on the hp screen, but i have the images from tne shopping center on this side of the border but again you can't see the lights from here. but i can tell you distinctly where the lights were at the time. i will go to target and get those to you.i need you address to mail them to you since i am writing from a public computer and can't feed the data into the hard drive from here.
Summary: I already reported this sigt and a gentleman from San Diego called me but I do not have a record. He called me Monday 02/25/at night and request ed from me to report him again if I saw the UFO. I checked it this morning @ 06:00 AM and sure enough there it
